scripts.deploy: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && rm -r client/build && mv ../client/build client && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push heroku master
scripts.install_modules: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i && cd ..
scripts.build_static: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && rm -r client/build && mv ../client/build client
